abstract: Panelists at New York University said beef is too great an icon to lose its place in the American diet.
snippet: Panelists at New York University said beef is too great an icon to lose its place in the American diet.
lead_paragraph: Have you been persuaded that beef is waning on the American plate because it's too destructive to the ecosystem, too hormone-pumped and too corn-fed artery-clogging?

headline.main: Beef Will Be What's for Dinner for a Long Time, Panelists Say
